img.alt: Success for All... Takes us All Image

h2.a: Success for All... Takes us All

div.div: At Culver City Unified School District, we take our responsibility seriously and are committed to excellence for all students in what we call The 4 A's: Academics, Athletics, Activities, and The Arts. Taking a Whole Child approach, our vision is that 100% of our students graduate from high school with unlimited opportunities in college and career, and are prepared to be successful in everything they endeavor to try.
CCUSD will be lending chromebooks to any student/parent who may still have a need on Monday, 4/6, from 10:30 a.m. until Noon at Culver City High School .
Messages from the Superintendent and CCUSD Health Services

h3.a: The Parcel Tax Exemption Filing Period is Now Open

div.p: CCUSD is committed to nondiscrimination of all individuals in education. Notice of Nondiscrimination.
